In England, in the seven days to 07 April, there were 15,799 new confirmed cases (28.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 March, there were 24,572 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 36% (8,773 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 April is 3,822,371 (6,790.9 cases per 100,000 population).
